(in-package "ACL2")
local
(local (include-book "times"))
local
(local (include-book "complex"))
local
(local (include-book "minus"))
local
(local (include-book "plus"))
local
(local (include-book "plus-and-minus"))
local
(local (include-book "kestrel/utilities/equal-of-booleans" :dir :system))
local
(local (defthm *-of-/-same
    (equal (* x (/ x))
      (if (equal 0 (fix x))
        0
        1))))
*-of-/-same-moretheorem
(defthm *-of-/-same-more
  (equal (* x (/ x) y)
    (if (equal 0 (fix x))
      0
      (fix y)))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance associativity-of-* (y (/ x)) (z y))
     :in-theory (disable associativity-of-*))))
/-of-/theorem
(defthm /-of-/
  (equal (/ (/ x)) (fix x))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance equal-of-*-and-*-cancel
       (x (/ x))
       (y (/ (/ x)))
       (z x))
     :in-theory (disable equal-of-*-and-*-cancel))))
equal-of-/-constanttheorem
(defthm equal-of-/-constant
  (implies (syntaxp (quotep k))
    (equal (equal k (/ x))
      (and (acl2-numberp k) (equal (fix x) (/ k))))))
<-of-/-and-constant-1theorem
(defthm <-of-/-and-constant-1
  (implies (and (syntaxp (quotep k))
      (< 0 k)
      (rationalp k)
      (rationalp y))
    (equal (< k (/ y)) (and (not (<= y 0)) (< y (/ k)))))
  :hints (("Goal" :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel)
     :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel (x1 k) (x2 (/ y)) (y y)))))
<-of-/-and-constant-2theorem
(defthm <-of-/-and-constant-2
  (implies (and (syntaxp (quotep k))
      (< 0 k)
      (rationalp k)
      (rationalp y))
    (equal (< (/ y) k) (or (<= y 0) (< (/ k) y))))
  :hints (("Goal" :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel)
     :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel (x1 (/ y)) (x2 k) (y y)))))
<-of-0-and-/theorem
(defthm <-of-0-and-/
  (implies (rationalp x) (equal (< 0 (/ x)) (< 0 x)))
  :hints (("Goal" :cases ((equal x 0) (< 0 x))
     :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel)
     :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel (x1 0) (x2 (/ x)) (y (- x))))))
<-of-/-and-0theorem
(defthm <-of-/-and-0
  (implies (rationalp x) (equal (< (/ x) 0) (< x 0))))
<-of-/-and-/theorem
(defthm <-of-/-and-/
  (implies (and (< 0 x) (< 0 y) (rationalp x) (rationalp y))
    (equal (< (/ x) (/ y)) (< y x)))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel
       (x1 (/ y))
       (x2 (/ x))
       (y (* x y)))
     :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel *-of-/-same-more))))
<=-of-/-lineartheorem
(defthm <=-of-/-linear
  (implies (and (<= x0 x) (< 0 x0) (rationalp x) (rationalp x0))
    (<= (/ x) (/ x0)))
  :rule-classes :linear)
complex-rationalp-of-unary-/theorem
(defthm complex-rationalp-of-unary-/
  (equal (complex-rationalp (/ y)) (complex-rationalp y))
  :hints (("Goal" :cases ((complex-rationalp y)))))
complex-rationalp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalptheorem
(defthm complex-rationalp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalp
  (implies (and (complex-rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (complex-rationalp (* x (/ y))) (not (equal 0 x)))))
rationalp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalptheorem
(defthm rationalp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalp
  (implies (and (complex-rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (rationalp (* x (/ y))) (equal 0 x))))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalptheorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalp
  (implies (and (complex-rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* x (/ y))) (equal 0 x))))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalp-alttheorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-rationalp-and-complex-rationalp-alt
  (implies (and (complex-rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* (/ y) x)) (equal 0 x))))
integerp-squeeze-gentheorem
(defthmd integerp-squeeze-gen
  (implies (and (< low x) (< x (+ 1 low)) (integerp low))
    (not (integerp x))))
<-of-*-of-/-and-1-when-negtheorem
(defthm <-of-*-of-/-and-1-when-neg
  (implies (and (< y 0) (rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (< (* x (/ y)) 1) (< y x)))
  :hints (("Goal" :use ((:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel-gen
        (x1 (* x (/ y)))
        (x2 1)
        (y (- y)))))))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-negativetheorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-negative
  (implies (and (< y x) (<= x 0) (rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* (/ y) x)) (or (equal x 0) (equal y 0))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance integerp-squeeze-gen (low 0) (x (* (/ y) x))))))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-negative-alttheorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-negative-alt
  (implies (and (< y x) (<= x 0) (rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* x (/ y))) (or (equal x 0) (equal y 0))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance integerp-squeeze-gen (low 0) (x (* (/ y) x))))))
local
(local (defthm /-of-complex-and-complex-step1
    (implies (and (rationalp a)
        (rationalp b)
        (rationalp c)
        (rationalp d))
      (equal (/ (complex a b) (complex c d))
        (* (/ (complex a b) (complex c d))
          (/ (complex c (- d)) (complex c (- d))))))
    :rule-classes nil
    :hints (("Goal" :in-theory (enable complex-opener)))))
equal-of-+-of-*-of-itheorem
(defthm equal-of-+-of-*-of-i
  (implies (and (rationalp a) (rationalp b) (rationalp k))
    (equal (equal k (+ a (* #C(0 1) b)))
      (and (equal k a) (equal 0 b))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance complex-equal (x1 k) (y1 0) (x2 a) (y2 b)))))
local
(local (defthm distributivity-alt
    (equal (* (+ y z) x) (+ (* y x) (* z x)))))
/-of-*theorem
(defthm /-of-*
  (equal (/ (* x y)) (* (/ x) (/ y)))
  :hints (("Goal" :use ((:instance equal-of-*-and-*-cancel
        (y (/ (* x y)))
        (z (* (/ x) (/ y)))
        (x (* x y))) (:instance *-of-/-same (x (* x y))))
     :in-theory (disable equal-of-*-and-*-cancel *-of-/-same))))
local
(local (defthm conjugate-helper
    (implies (and (rationalp c) (rationalp d))
      (equal (* (/ (+ c (* #C(0 1) d))) (/ (+ c (- (* #C(0 1) d)))))
        (/ (+ (* c c) (* d d)))))
    :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance /-of-*
         (x (+ c (* #C(0 1) d)))
         (y (+ c (- (* #C(0 1) d)))))
       :in-theory (disable /-of-*)))))
/-of-complex-and-complextheorem
(defthm /-of-complex-and-complex
  (implies (and (rationalp a)
      (rationalp b)
      (rationalp c)
      (rationalp d))
    (equal (/ (complex a b) (complex c d))
      (complex (/ (+ (* a c) (* b d)) (+ (* c c) (* d d)))
        (/ (- (* b c) (* a d)) (+ (* c c) (* d d))))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use /-of-complex-and-complex-step1
     :in-theory (enable complex-opener))))
<-of-*-of-/-arg1theorem
(defthm <-of-*-of-/-arg1
  (implies (and (rationalp x) (rationalp y) (rationalp z))
    (equal (< (* x (/ y)) z)
      (if (< 0 y)
        (< x (* y z))
        (if (equal 0 y)
          (< 0 z)
          (< (* y z) x)))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel-gen
       (x1 (* x (/ y)))
       (x2 z)
       (y y))
     :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel-gen))))
<-of-*-of-/-arg1-alttheorem
(defthm <-of-*-of-/-arg1-alt
  (implies (and (rationalp x) (rationalp y) (rationalp z))
    (equal (< (* (/ y) x) z)
      (if (< 0 y)
        (< x (* y z))
        (if (equal 0 y)
          (< 0 z)
          (< (* y z) x)))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use <-of-*-of-/-arg1)))
<-of-*-of-/-arg2theorem
(defthm <-of-*-of-/-arg2
  (implies (and (rationalp x) (rationalp y) (rationalp z))
    (equal (< z (* x (/ y)))
      (if (< 0 y)
        (< (* y z) x)
        (if (equal 0 y)
          (< z 0)
          (< x (* y z))))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance <-of-*-and-*-cancel-gen (x1 z) (x2 (* x (/ y))))
     :in-theory (disable <-of-*-and-*-cancel-gen <-of-*-of-/-arg1))))
<-of-*-of-/-arg2-alttheorem
(defthm <-of-*-of-/-arg2-alt
  (implies (and (rationalp x) (rationalp y) (rationalp z))
    (equal (< z (* (/ y) x))
      (if (< 0 y)
        (< (* y z) x)
        (if (equal 0 y)
          (< z 0)
          (< x (* y z))))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use <-of-*-of-/-arg2
     :in-theory (disable <-of-*-of-/-arg2))))
/-of--theorem
(defthm /-of--
  (equal (/ (- x)) (- (/ x)))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance equal-of-*-and-*-cancel
       (x (- x))
       (y (/ (- x)))
       (z (- (/ x))))
     :in-theory (disable equal-of-*-and-*-cancel))))
--of-/theorem
(defthmd --of-/ (equal (- (/ x)) (/ (- x))))
other
(theory-invariant (incompatible (:rewrite --of-/) (:rewrite /-of--)))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-mixed-1theorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-mixed-1
  (implies (and (< x (- y)) (<= 0 x) (rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* x (/ y))) (or (equal x 0) (equal y 0))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance integerp-squeeze-gen (low 0) (x (* (/ (- y)) x))))))
integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-mixed-2theorem
(defthm integerp-of-*-of-/-when-<-and-mixed-2
  (implies (and (< (- x) y) (<= x 0) (rationalp y) (rationalp x))
    (equal (integerp (* x (/ y))) (or (equal x 0) (equal y 0))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance integerp-squeeze-gen (low 0) (x (* (/ (- y)) x))))))
<-of-/-and-constanttheorem
(defthm <-of-/-and-constant
  (implies (and (syntaxp (quotep k))
      (< 0 x)
      (< 0 k)
      (rationalp k)
      (rationalp x))
    (equal (< k (/ x)) (< x (/ k))))
  :rule-classes ((:rewrite :loop-stopper nil))
  :hints (("Goal")))
/-equal-constant-alttheorem
(defthm /-equal-constant-alt
  (implies (and (syntaxp (quotep k))
      (< 0 x)
      (< 0 k)
      (rationalp k)
      (rationalp x))
    (equal (< (/ x) k) (< (/ k) x)))
  :rule-classes ((:rewrite :loop-stopper nil)))
<=-of-*-of-/-when-both-negative-lineartheorem
(defthm <=-of-*-of-/-when-both-negative-linear
  (implies (and (< i 0) (<= j -1) (rationalp i) (rationalp j))
    (<= (* i (/ j)) (- i)))
  :rule-classes :linear)
<=-of-*-of-/-when-negative-and-positive-lineartheorem
(defthm <=-of-*-of-/-when-negative-and-positive-linear
  (implies (and (<= 0 i) (<= j -1) (rationalp i) (rationalp j))
    (<= (- i) (* i (/ j))))
  :rule-classes :linear)
<=-of-*-of-/-when-both-nonnegative-lineartheorem
(defthm <=-of-*-of-/-when-both-nonnegative-linear
  (implies (and (<= 0 i) (<= 1 j) (rationalp i) (rationalp j))
    (<= (* i (/ j)) i))
  :rule-classes :linear)
equal-of-*-/-and---sametheorem
(defthm equal-of-*-/-and---same
  (implies (and (rationalp i) (rationalp j))
    (equal (equal (* i (/ j)) (- i))
      (if (equal i 0)
        t
        (equal (/ j) -1))))
  :hints (("Goal" :use (:instance equal-of-*-and-*-cancel
       (x (/ i))
       (y (* i (/ j)))
       (z (- i)))
     :in-theory (disable equal-of-*-and-*-cancel))))
/-bound-when-non-negative-and-integertheorem
(defthm /-bound-when-non-negative-and-integer
  (implies (and (integerp j) (<= 0 i) (rationalp i))
    (<= (- i) (/ i j)))
  :hints (("Goal" :cases ((<= j -1)))))
